description:
Naruto and his fellow participants arrive at the Forest of Death, the site of the second part of the Chunin Exam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Ni Shiken Start! Mawari wa Minna Teki Darake!
La seconde épreuve ! Tout le monde est un ennemi
The Chunin Exam Stage 2: The Forest of Death
ทุกคนล้วนเป็นศัตรูกันหมด
第二試験スタート! 周りはみんな敵だらけ!
